item.title: System Design Interview - Notification Service
item.description: A deep-dive, expert-level guide to designing a scalable Notification Service. This massively expanded post explores detailed architectural patterns, technology trade-offs (Kafka vs. RabbitMQ), advanced reliability mechanisms, in-depth scaling strategies, API design with OpenAPI specs, and much more to create a truly comprehensive resource.
